titleStmt.title: The office of a justice of peace, together with instructions, how and in what manner statutes shall be expounded. / Written by W. Fleetwood, Esq; sometime recorder of London. Since continued, with the late acts and ordinances abridged, relating to that office.
titleStmt.author: Fleetwood, William, 1535?-1594.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Ralph Wood, for W. Lee, D. Pakeman, and G. Bedell, and are to be sold at their shops in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "9ber [i.e. November] 17"; the 8 in the imprint date has been crossed out and replaced with a "7".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
